channel.title: Can someone help me with rsc server to be made please
channel.description: im in the military bene awhile since done everything.. im trying to get a classic server going to where i can fix it all myself,, i tried the divine one, but only thing is its missing the www folder so im not sure what to do now . kinda stuck. i wanted to try running a server with the rscemulation files but im not evfen sure how to do all that.. would be nice to get help but doesnt seem like will much lately.. ive tried and tried.. i can even download that one thing so you can help me while talking on teamspeak or something.

item.title: Can someone help me with rsc server to be made please
item.dc:creator: @Artemis_Wp Artemis Wp
item.description:
@Artemis_Wp wrote:

Ill suggest you to use NOOBScape v3 !
It’s best for beginners.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me with rsc server to be made please

item.title: Can someone help me with rsc server to be made please
item.dc:creator: @D.Shark D.Shark
item.description:
@D.Shark wrote:

If you want to do everything your self it’s worth not using the WWW files and just making your own, and bridging it with whatever you want (PHPBB, VBB, FluxBB… whatever) as I think they have security holes in them (what I’ve read some time ago).

If you want to login and fuck around, just download that EasyRSC sticky, everyone says that’s simple.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me with rsc server to be made please
